Name: Christmas Sort Puzzle
About the game: Christmas Sort Puzzle is a fun and addictive puzzle game! Try to sort the Christmas icons in the tube until all icons are the same. A challenging yet relaxing game to exercise your brain! HOW TO PLAY: • Tap any tube to move the icon lying on top of any tube into another tube • The rule is that you can only move an icon on top of another icon if both of them have the same icon and the tube you want to move into has enough space. Otherwise, the ball is rejected. • You can always restart the level at any time. • Stack all the icons with the same icon into a single tube. ★ FEATURES: • 4 game modes (100 levels each). • Elegant background music. • Run smoothly • NO penalties & time limits; you can enjoy Christmas Sort Puzzle at your own pace!
